pr_title: Fixed interval summary files being empty in DepthOfCoverage

timeline.message: Remember kids, always add tests for empty files in your test suite or you end up missing something important

timeline.author: lbergelson

timeline.bodyText: This seems like a fairly significant bug... did no one ever look at the output file? or are there multiple?
timeline.author: lbergelson

replies.bodyText: There are 25 output files for each of these tests, and the one that was checked in was generated correctly before the rebase in question so it was missed. This only affects 4 of the 25 output files from this tool.
replies.author: jamesemery
